41575881.title: Shahrak-e Bakhtiar Dasht
41575881.extract: Shahrak-e Bakhtiar Dasht (Persian: شهرك بختياردشت, also Romanized as Shahrak-e Bakhtīār Dasht) is a village in Mahmudabad Rural District, in the Central District of Isfahan County, Isfahan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 327, in 90 families.
